alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern New London County through 830 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over eastern New London County. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Groton, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Voluntown, Gales Ferry and Ledyard Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
